page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content:
...of MICHELLE McHUGH (primary age)
{6:10 I got up {6:20 I ate breakfast {6:40 I got dressed {6:55 I brushed my hair {7:15 I brushed my teeth {7:20 I played Racing Cars with my { brother {7:45 I watched 'telly' (TVAM,the { breakfast_time programme) {8:10 I made my packed lunch {8:25 I put my PE kit in my school { bag {8:45 I left for school {8:56 I arrived at school {9:20 We went in to assembly {9:46 We returned to our classroom {10:03 We did some maths {10:45 playtime {11:09 We did some English {11:55 The bell sounded for lunch
